text: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, ẹ tẹ̀lé (àṣẹ) Allāhu, ẹ tẹ̀lé (àṣẹ) Òjíṣẹ́ náà àti àwọn aláṣẹ nínú yín. Nítorí náà, tí ẹ bá yapa ẹnu sí kiní kan, ẹ ṣẹ́rí rẹ̀ sí ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu àti Òjíṣẹ́ (sollalāhu 'alayhi wa sallam), tí ẹ bá gbàgbọ́ nínú Allāhu àti Ọjọ́ Ìkẹ́yìn. Ìyẹn lóore jùlọ, ó sì dára jùlọ fún ìkángun ọ̀rọ̀
